Institute_Summary:
Every year thousands of students go abroad to widen their academic horizons, education, and job opportunities. Nowadays a noticeable number of Indian students are desirous of pursuing Postgraduate Courses in Germany, rather than in the typical favorite destinations abroad, such as the U.K and Australia. Increasing racial attacks on Indian students in Australia, changes in student immigration Policy in the UK, and the highly discouraging Student Visa policy adopted by the USA, have now shifted the choice of the students to Germany for education purposes. In addition to these factors, there are a growing number of German Universities offering free education. The Euro Zone crisis is providing a favorable environment for the students from India, as Germany is the only nation that is immune to the effects of the Eurozone crisis because of the sound economic policies that place it at a higher level in terms of choice of highly skilled workers and students.

Through its foreign policies, Germany is putting in considerable efforts to attract critical talent to work and study in Germany. A foreign national can seek employment in Germany if they have a residence permit, which entitles them to live and work there. One can attain a residence permit with the help of the foreign immigration authority located in their home country. Germany is the first European nation that has given its nod to European Union Blue Card Bill in addition to its own German Green Card System. The sooner you start the process the better it is. Preparing your application to get approved takes due diligence, but as for now you, don’t have to worry because you are in the right place to start your search for the right educational course according to your area of interest.

If you are planning to study in Germany and eyeing for the right Consultant to study in Germany, then you are in the right place. We at Studyfeeds.com provide students with relevant information and procedure to get them through in the most sought after universities in Germany. We have placed thousands of Indian students in Germany for higher studies over the years that we have very specialized knowledge in processing the admissions procedure especially for Post Graduate Courses in Germany. There are not many credible sources through which consultation about German education is provided in India, as this is a niche area and requires an excellent understanding of the universities offering higher studies in English & in Germany, the admission process, and follow up. When it comes to the higher studies in Germany Study Feeds is the most ideal firm and undoubtedly the number one in this domain of sourcing the right information about higher studies in Germany. Our successfully placed Indian students in Germany are our true mascots.

Hence, we started Ubergrad with a simple mission "to provide the most useful and accurate information on finding the right schools and the resources to get there". We are a small and passionate team that is working hard to make this vision come true. Taking cognizance of what Mr. Barack Obama, 44th President of the United States of America, once said in a University address, "American Education is the GOLD standard internationally. More and more International Students are looking to enter US Universities and we should be welcoming them with open hands and warm hearts", we are currently focussing on students wanting to pursue Graduate programs in the USA.
